actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to extend for 2 years the authorization for the emergency job programs under title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.
short_title: Emergency Public Service Employment Extension Act

summary.text: Emergency Public Service Employment Extension Act - Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary for the fiscal years 1976 and 1977 to carry out the emergency jobs programs under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act. Provides for the allocation of such sums and special conditions for preferred consideration to unemployed persons without alternative sources of income.

titles.title: Emergency Public Service Employment Extension Act
A bill to extend for 2 years the authorization for the emergency job programs under title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.
